title: California State University, Long Beach
summary: California State University, Long Beach (CSULB, Long Beach State, Cal State Long Beach, LBSU, or Beach) is a public university in Long Beach, California.  The 322-acre campus is the second largest[7] of the 23-school California State University system (CSU)[11] and one of the largest universities in the state of California by enrollment, its student body numbering 39,359 for the fall 2020 semester.[7] With 5,440 graduate students as of fall 2020, the university enrolls one of the largest graduate student populations across the CSU system and in the state of California.[12]
